mapper.insert: insert into board(b_tno, btitle, bcontent) values (#{b_tno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent})
mapper.select:
select b.no, b.btitle, b.bcontent, m.mno as writer_no from board b inner join member m on m.mno=b.mno
where b.btitle like concat('%', #{value},'%') or b.bcontent like concat('%', #{value},'%') or m.bname like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by b.bno desc
select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.date, b.count, b.t_bno, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name from board b inner join member m on m.mno=b.writer where b.bno = #{value}
